Yonkers.Botanical Garden (Metro-North station):
The Botanical Garden (Hindi: बॉटानिकल गार्डन) is an interchange metro station in Noida between the Blue Line and Magenta Line of the Delhi Metro. Under Phase 3 of the Delhi Metro, Magenta Line is being constructed that will connect Botanical Garden to Janakpuri West, another metro station on the Blue Line.
Botanical Garden is a terminal station on the Magenta Line.
